events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect item being delivered.
Your case has been assigned to Sarah, one of our customer service agents, for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with the refund process for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so that we can process your refund?
I have attached the photos of the wrong product and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and you don’t need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks a lot! That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick resolution and your help.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. Please check your payment account in a few days and contact us if you have any further questions.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund for the incorrect item. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
I have received the refund today. Thank you for the smooth and hassle-free service!
We are closing this case as resolved. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance in the future.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on your recent support experience.
